name: legalform-js
description: Create a form from a LegalForms definition

scripts.build-dist: node_modules/.bin/browserify js/legalform.js --im -s LegalForm > tmp/legalform.js; node_modules/.bin/browserify js/ractive-legalform.js --im > tmp/ractive-legalform.js; cat tmp/legalform.js tmp/ractive-legalform.js js/legalform-validation.js js/lib/to-material.js > dist/legalform.js; cat css/*.css > dist/legalform.css
